text: Ndipo iwo amene anamanga Mzikiti ndi cholinga choyambitsachisokonezondikulimbikitsakusakhulupirira ndi kugawanitsa anthu okhulupirira, poyembekezera kwa amene adachita nkhondo ndi Mulungu ndi Mtumwi wake pambuyo pake, iwo adzalumbira kuti cholinga chawo chidali chabwino. Mulungu achitira umboni kuti iwo ndi onama
